title: Quality
description: A description of the quality (limits of detection, accuracy, precision, uncertainty) of an analytical protocol

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier for this protocol

limitOfDetection.title: limit of detection
limitOfDetection.description: Either a URL or a string describing the limit of detection for the analytical method

accuracy.title: accuracy
accuracy.description: Either a URL or a string describing the accuracy of the analytical method

precision.title: precision
precision.description: Either a URL or a string describing the precision of the analytical method

uncertainty.title: uncertainty
uncertainty.description: Either a URL or a string describing the uncertainty of the analytical method
